title: The Todd Starnes Show – August 28th, 2019
text:
Here's what happened today on The Todd Starnes Show:

Todd speaks with Deputy White House Press Secretary Hogan Gidley about how President Trump is treated in the media and the latest controversy involving Rep. Omar.



Email Embed

Watch the latest video at foxnews.com

Todd speaks with "Ball of Collusion" author Andrew McCarthy about whether there will be consequences for former members of the FBI after the Russia investigation.



Email Embed

+ Embed Code



Embed the following code on your website:



Watch the latest video at foxnews.com

Todd speaks with Fox News' Judge Jeanine Pirro about the left's attacks on President Trump and her new book "Radicals, Resistance, and Revenge: The Left's Plot to Remake America."
